name: Seniorb
description:
Welcome ! This is Seniorb

Seniorb is a puzzle game 

How to play?

You can move your player with gamepad,keyboard(WASD,arrow keys) or mobile phone(tilt)

You should avoid bullets coming from turrets

To open laser gates,you must charge yourself with that color

The light on all levels' ending is finish light.

Click anywhere while playing to get back to menu.

Also I would really appreciate if you check my patreon page :)
